title: Homo
description: "I don't see why I have to become this new person just because I like guys. Most of who I am has nothing to do with who I hump."Will's never been obvious about being gay. Not like Daniel, who takes the heat -- and the beatings -- at Spencer High. But then Will's best friend outs him on Facebook, and his small-town life starts to spin out of control. If he's not like everyone else, and he's not like Daniel, then who is he?[Fry reading level - 4.3]
author: Michael Harris
